mapper.select: select b.id as id, b.isbn as isbn, b.name as name, a.name as authorName, p.name as publisherName, b.price as price, b.stock as stock, b.smallImage as smallImage, b.bigImage as bigImage, b.introduction as introduction, b.createtime as createtime, b.updatetime as updatetime, b.state as state from book b INNER JOIN author a on b.author_id=a.id INNER JOIN publisher p on b.publisher_id=p.id where b.id=#{id}

select b.id as id, b.isbn as isbn, b.name as name, a.name as authorName, p.name as publisherName, b.price as price, b.stock as stock, b.smallImage as smallImage, b.bigImage as bigImage, b.introduction as introduction, b.createtime as createtime, b.updatetime as updatetime, b.state as state from book b INNER JOIN author a on b.author_id=a.id INNER JOIN publisher p on b.publisher_id=p.id limit #{start},#{limit}
